dx-tabs dx-tab-buttons, dx-tab-button, dx-tab-panels, dx-tab-panel dx-tabs.min.js   (↓) A set of show/hide sections called tab panels–displayed one at a time. usage docs source <dx-tabs value="example"> <dx-tab-buttons> <dx-tab-button value="tab-1">Tab one</dx-tab-button> <dx-tab-button value="tab-2">Tab two</dx-tab-button> </dx-tab-buttons> <dx-tab-panels> <dx-tab-panel value="tab-1">Panel one</dx-tab-panel> <dx-tab-panel value="tab-2">Panel two</dx-tab-panel> </dx-tab-panels> </dx-tabs> Docs Source
